value.title: StarCraft 2: Zest's SPICY Stargate Variety! (Best-of-5 vs Solar)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Solar (Zerg) and Zest (Protoss). In this match Zest decides to play a vareity of Stargate openers, from Void Rays to Tempests and Phoenixes. This series is the grand finals of the ESL Open Cup 108 Korea.
